TripItinerary.title: Trip Itinerary
TripItinerary.description: A generated travel itinerary, linked to a user by their email.

userEmail.description: The email of the user who created the itinerary.

destination.description: The travel destination city and country.

tripSummary.description: An overall summary of the generated trip itinerary.

totalEstimatedCost.description: The estimated total cost for the trip.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the itinerary was created.
